name: YourSocialMap.com
tag_list: community, social, map, network, build-network, socialmarketing
description: YourSocialMap.com is a way to visualize
overview:
First of all YourSocialMap.com is Free for ever. The importance of your social network is how it is profiled. It’s useless to have hundreds of friends and to know only a part of it. YourSocialMap.com has an human interface that helps you to categorize and describe your contacts. YourSocialmap.com is based on the “Dunbar’s Number” theory that limit the number of people with one can mantein stable relationship. These are relationships in which an individual knows who each person is, and how each person relates to every other persons Proponents assert that numbers larger than this generally require more restrictive rules, laws, and enforced norms to maintain a stable, cohesive group. No precise value has been proposed for Dunbar’s number. It lies between 100 and 230, but a commonly used value is 150. (Wikipedia).

YourSocialMap.com with an easy and fast human interface allow you to update and list all your connections for ever!

With YourSocialMap.com you can find out even if you belong to one of the following status:

  • Broker (with 150 connections)

  • Linker (with 300 connections)

  • Bridger (with 600 connections)

  • Master Network (with 1000 connections)
